alert.note: Alert for Duchesne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 6:47PM MDT until September 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Duchesne. This includes US 191 through Indian Canyon. * WHEN...Until 845 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 646 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... US 191 through Indian Canyon.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
